title: Touch: Sebangou no Nai Ace
original_name: タッチ 背番号のないエース
opening_song: "Sebangou no Nai Ace (背番号のないエース)" by Rough & Ready
ending_song: "Glass No Seishun (ガラスの青春)" by Rough & Ready
sinopse:
Compilation movie of the first year of Touch timeline. Contains plot differences, added scenes and an alternate ending.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
